item.title: Tip: Gadgets, Deals And Stuff You Need To Know - Part III
item.description: This is the last part in this series. So far we’ve seen how to select the gadget and how to get the best price for it. This time we’ll fill in the last remaining piece of the puzzle, the minor tit-bits that go a long way in preventing a lot of heart-burn. Don’t worry this is a short one. This last piece is to make sure that the place that you decided upon to buy your gadget, is OK in all respects, i.

item.title: Tip: Gadgets, Deals And Stuff You Need To Know - Part II
item.description: Last time we discussed how to select the gadget that you want to buy. This time I’ll tell you some of the things that I do to find the best price for it. Use Price Comparison Engines: These engines will let you search for your desired products and provide a comparison of the costs at which they are available at different stores online as well as offline. Two of my favourites are Price Grabber and Froogle.
